reviewText: Very good for an indie game. It's simple, but really entertaining. The felling you get from going through all those track, each with unique styling and themesong - it really gives you chills :D. I hope this arena mode" will get developed further
date: I also hope for new levels in the future ;)."

reviewText: Not the best game I've seen, but It's a good indie racing game: not perfect graphics, but pretty good physics\nAnd it worth  playing with company
